title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL

items.title: How We Obtained 10,000 Police Disciplinary Records

items.title: ASML to Invest $1.5 Billion in Mistral, the French A.I. Start-Up
items.description: ASML, the Dutch maker of semiconductor equipment, is investing about $1.5 billion in Mistral, the French A.I. start-up.
